document_data.title: Mulmaster Undone
document_data.editor: [[Claire Hoffman]], [[Chris Tulach]], [[Travis Woodall]]{{Cite adventurers league/Mulmaster Undone|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Mulmaster Undone''''' is an Epic Adventures module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Elemental Evil|Elemental Evil]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Mulmaster]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 10{{th}}-level characters. The module has been retired by Adventurers League. 

{{Quote|''The Cults of Elemental Evil have been unveiled within the City of Danger and in retaliation, they seek to use the fundamental forces of nature to destroy it from within. Join your factions as well as the Blades, Cloaks, Hawks and Soldiers alike in defending Mulmaster against those that would burn, crush, drown, and buffet it into oblivion.''|}}
